name: Window Management
description: Resize, reorganize and move your focused window effortlessly

commands.name: Top Half
commands.description: Move the focused window to fill left half of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Half
commands.description: Move the focused window to fill bottom half of the screen.

commands.name: Left Half
commands.description: Move the focused window to fill left half of the screen.

commands.name: Right Half
commands.description: Move the focused window to fill right half of the screen.

commands.name: Center Half
commands.description: Move the focused window to fill center half of the screen.

commands.name: Maximize
commands.description: Maximize the focused window to fit the screen.

commands.name: Top Left Quarter
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top left quarter of the screen.

commands.name: Top Right Quarter
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top right quarter of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Left Quarter
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom left quarter of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Right Quarter
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom right quarter of the screen.

commands.name: Top Left Sixth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top left sixth of the screen.

commands.name: Top Center Sixth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top center sixth of the screen.

commands.name: Top Right Sixth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top right sixth of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Left Sixth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom left sixth of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Center Sixth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom center sixth of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Right Sixth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom right sixth of the screen.

commands.name: Top Third
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top third of the screen.

commands.name: Middle Third
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the middle third of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Third
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom third of the screen.

commands.name: Center
commands.description: Center the focused window in the screen.

commands.name: First Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the first fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Second Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the second fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Third Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the third fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Last Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the last fourth of the screen.

commands.description: Resize the focused window to the first third of the screen.

commands.name: Center Third
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the center third of the screen.

commands.name: Last Third
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the last third of the screen.

commands.name: First Two Thirds
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the first two thirds of the screen.

commands.name: Center Two Thirds
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the center two thirds of the screen.

commands.name: Last Two Thirds
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the last two thirds of the screen.

commands.name: First Three Fourths
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the first three fourths of the screen.

commands.name: Center Three Fourths
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the center three fourths of the screen.

commands.name: Last Three Fourths
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the last three fourths of the screen.

commands.name: Top Three Fourths
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top three fourths of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Three Fourths
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom three fourths of the screen.

commands.name: Top Two Thirds
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top two thirds of the screen.

commands.name: Bottom Two Thirds
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the bottom two thirds of the screen.

commands.name: Top Center Two Thirds
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top center two thirds of the screen.

commands.name: Top First Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top first fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Top Second Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top second fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Top Third Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top third fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Top Last Fourth
commands.description: Resize the focused window to the top last fourth of the screen.

commands.name: Make Larger
commands.description: Increase the focused window until it reaches the screen size.

commands.name: Make Smaller
commands.description: Decrease the focused window until it reaches its minimal size.

commands.name: Almost Maximize
commands.description: Maximize the focused window to almost fit the screen.

commands.name: Maximize Width
commands.description: Maximize width of the focused window to fit the screen.

commands.name: Maximize Height
commands.description: Maximize height of the focused window to fit the screen.

commands.name: Move Up
commands.description: Move the focused window to the top edge of the screen.

commands.name: Move Down
commands.description: Move the focused window to the bottom of the screen.

commands.name: Move Left
commands.description: Move the focused window to the left edge of the screen.

commands.name: Move Right
commands.description: Move the focused window to the right edge of the screen.

commands.name: Next Desktop
commands.description: Move the focused window to the next desktop.

commands.name: Previous Desktop
commands.description: Move the focused window to the previous desktop.

commands.name: Next Display
commands.description: Move the focused window to the next display.

commands.name: Previous Display
commands.description: Move the focused window to the previous display.

commands.name: Restore
commands.description: Restore the focused window to its last position.

commands.name: Toggle Fullscreen
commands.description: Toggle fullscreen mode.
